sections.heading: 01|Powers of companies - deposits required of foreign companies
sections.text: Effective:August 8, 1991Latest Legislation:Senate Bill 137 - 119th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDF(A) A domestic, foreign, or alien mutual or stock insurance company, other than a life insurance company, organized or admi

sections.heading: the Revised Code authorize such a guaranty company as is described therein to become surety upon the bond required by law of any state officer, except the superintendent of insurance, and of any county, township, or municipal officer
sections.text: Such company may be accepted by the officers required to approve
